info.title: API documenations using Swagger
info.description: Sample project which generates API documentaion using swagger.

tags.name: Auths
tags.description: Contains all endpoints related to roles. This will give a package access to users

tags.name: Features
tags.description: Contains all endpoints related to features. This will be the bases for user access in the roles

tags.name: Roles
tags.description: Contains all endpoints related to roles. This will give a package access to users

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Contains all endpoints related to users.

tags.name: Owner
tags.description: Contains all endpoints related to the current signedin user.

post.summary: Signin to the application to get jwt
post.description:
Signin to the application to get jwt. If signin limited transaction is enabled then after certain
number of signin attempts the user will be disabled, if signin successfull it will return object containing jwt, username and message
If otp signin is enabled, generate otp code and send it to a user contact, also it will return username and message.

post.summary: OTP Signin to the application to get jwt
post.description:
OTP Signin to the application to get jwt. At certain number of otp-signin attempts, the user will be disable for security reason.
If otp sign in is successfull then this will return jwt and message.

post.summary: Create a user account.
post.description:
Create a user account. This will register initial user information like username password and user contact.
However the created account is still disabled and not yet verified, You still need to contact administrator
to enable and verify your account.

post.summary: File a forgot request password.
post.description:
File a forgot request password. If the user have a verified contact, then a passwprd reset key
will be sent to the contact address. However no contact are registered or no verified contact, then the reset password key
will be sent to the administrator as default contact.

example.message: Password reset key has been sent

put.summary: Reset the password using otp key.
put.description:
Reset the password using otp key. To proceed changing the password,
use the change password key sent to the user contact, username and the new password you want.

delete.summary: Signout to the application, remove access token from user device
delete.description: Signout to the application. This will remove the access token from the user devices.

get.description: Get paginated features. The default size of pagination is 100.

post.summary: Create a Feature
post.description: Create a Feature. features are used for access control. If a value is already existing, a conflict status will be thrown.

type.description: this is use to categorize features

value.description: this is the value that the access middleware will check.

name.description: to make a user friendly identifier

tags.description: this value will be used in the UI to further categorize features like directories

example.description: One of the server endpoint
example.name: GET \api\v1\systemInfo

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: this the uuid of the feature to get

example.description: One of the server endpoint
example.name: GET \api\v1\systemInfo

put.description: Update a Feature. If value is being updated and is already existing, a conflict status will be thrown.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: this the uuid of the feature to update

post.summary: Create a Role.
post.description: Create a Role. If a role is already existing then this will throw a conflict error.

name.description: the name identifier for the role

level.description: this will be the indicator of the highest to lowest access writes of a role

example.description: Have access to most of the resources.
example.name: Manager

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: this the uuid of the role to get

get.summary: Get all the user contact informations

Get all the user contact informations. User contact information can be many types of user info
like firstname, middlename, lastname, nirthdarte, bithplace and more

name.description: just a name use to identify the feature

type.description: use to identify type of feature.

tags.description: this will be use in UI to categorize the features

value.description: the actual value to use when checking internally in the application

name.description: a unique human readable identifier for the role

level.description: a unique number to give role a sense of power. The lower the number the greater the power.

absoluteAuthority.description: if the value is true, all features are accessable to user with this role.

featuresRefs.description: if absoluteAuthority is false then the only accessable feature to user with this role are the features registered here.

example.description: Have access to most of the resources.
